name: Mobile Frame Zero
description:
A digital version of the Mobile Frame Zero tabletop wargame.

Controls

  • Camera:
    • W, A, S, D: forward, left, back, right
    • Space, Shift: up, down
    • Middle Mouse + move: mouselook
    • Mouse Wheel: zoom
  • Hangar:
    • todo
  • Battle:
    • todo

Credits

Mobile Frame Zero IP from http://mobileframezero.com/

Scenery and ground objects from Kenney Game Assets packs.
